original_title: Minister orders Chinese national with forged passports to be deported
original_body_lines: Public Security Minister Tiran Alles has directed the officials of the Department of Immigration and Emigration to deport the Chinese national who had arrived in the country with two forged passports.
At the instructions of the Public Security Minister, the Chinese national had been summoned to the Department of Immigration and Emigration to record a statement in connection with the incident.
The Chinese national who had arrived with two forged passports was earlier detained at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA).
